# rawData

**Instance Property**

The raw RFC 2822 header and body content of the message.

## Declaration

```swift
var rawData: Data? { get }
```

## Discussion

The content is available after MailKit downloads the message. MailKit provides the content as unprocessed data. For details about the format of the data, see [https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc2822].



## Accessing Message Content

- **headers**: A dictionary that contains the message’s header values.

items.description: A dictionary that contains the message’s header values.
